name: Nityaasha Foundation

address: Opp. Ruby Hall Clinic, Dhole Patil Road,

briefDescription: Nityaasha Foundation is a registered charitable trust established in July 2013, working for children from the economically weaker section of the society with Type 1 Diabetes & Epilepsy. Our vision is “To provide an equal opportunity for those from economically weaker sections to cherish the gift of life”. Mission is “To bestow healthy life by fulfilling the medical needs of the underprivileged through holistic support”We wish to ensure that these children are self-dependent and lead a normal, healthy, qualitative and meaningful life.

address: Behind Clover Mystique Society, Kalyani Nagar
